entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 1:06 PM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 29 March 2023
